CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 20, 1946, pg. 16, reads: "Footlighters - This is the name of the new interracial organization which is rehearsing 'Wuthering Heights' for fall presentation. The group is under the direction of Carl Christian, well known in little theatre groups in Pittsburgh. Shown above are scenes from the play. Left, Walter Gober, John Johns and Dorothy Scott go through their paces... - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors from Footlighters drama group Walter Gober, John Johns, and Dorothy Scott performing scene in "Wuthering Heights," in interior with linoleum floor
